metadata.title: CVE-2023-26034 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: ZoneMinder is a free, open source Closed-circuit television softwareapplication for Linux which supports IP, USB and Analog cameras. Versionsprior to 1.36.33 and 1.37.33 are affected by a SQL Injection vulnerability.The (blind) SQL Injection vulnerability is present within the`filter[Query][terms][0][attr]` query string parameter of the`/zm/index.php` endpoint. A user with the View or Edit permissions ofEvents may execute arbitrary SQL. The resulting impact can includeunauthorized data access (and modification), authentication and/orauthorization bypass, and remote code execution.

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
